英文公告.附加說明: 1. When the documentation is purchased in person, tenderers shall check the documentation right away, and requests for amendment or supplements shall be made immediately if any page is missing or the seal designated for tender invitation is absent. For mail orders, tenderers shall request amendment or supplements prior to the closing date at the entity where the documentation was purchased. Otherwise, the tender forms submitted will be deemed invalid. Any objection shall be handled pursuant to the Government Procurement Act.2. The tender forms downloaded from the Internet are deemed invalid when submitted without a hard copy form of the electronic certificate (of which the serial number must not be repeated) if the explanation provided by the supplier upon notification is considered unreasonable by the entity, or if they are missing the seal of the Management Section, Seventh River Management Office, WRA, MOEA.3. Tender documents shall be sealed and delivered to the Office by mail or in person prior to the submission deadline.4. Notices on release of the bid bond: (1) Please refer to the Bidding Instructions for Engineering Project Procurement and associated appendixes published by the Water Resources Agency; (2) The note shall be payable to the Seventh River Management Office, WRA, MOEA; (3) For cash payment, please transfer the payment to the bid bond account of the Office (302 Special Account of Seventh River Management Office, WRA, MOEA) at the Bank of Taiwan Pingtung Branch (account no. 017-036-03058-8), and put a receipt copy into the certificate envelope or submit the copy at the venue (the bid bond can’t be released until within five days of tender opening for this payment option); no cash payment is accepted at the venue.5. Please refer to the Bidding Instructions for Engineering Project Procurement published by the Water Resources Agency for required certificates. Photocopies that are the same as the original certificates shall be submitted; otherwise, the tender forms will be invalided.6. For any interpretation questions or concerns about violation of laws in regard to the content of the tender documentation, please submit a written form to the Seventh River Management Office four days before tenders are opened. Late submissions will not be accepted.7. Please see the Supplementary Construction Instructions for the total amount of performance bond required.8. The Office may announce postponement of the contract award for tenderers who meet the principle of contract award and wait until legal budgeting procedures have been completed before awarding the contract.9. To report any illegal conduct by entities, please e-mail a complaint to the Procurement Supervision Unit of MOEA at ps.unit@moea.gov.tw, or contact the Water Resources Agency at P. O. Box 47-7, Taichung or 04-22501578.
